author: The Yomiuri Shimbun
title: Japan Experienced Hottest July on Record; August Also Expected to be Hotter than Average - The Japan News
text: Last month was the hottest July in the nationâ€™s history, with the highest monthly average temperature since records started being taken in 1898, according to the Japan Meteorological Agency. The average temperatures at 15 locations, that have been relatively unaffected by urbanization, were 0.25 C higher than last July â€” then the hottest July on record â€” and 2.16 C higher than the average between 1991 and 2020, the agency said Thursday. Average temperatures by region were also high across the board. According to national observatory data from 149 locations, the average temperatures were 2.6 C above average in northern Japan; 2.3 C higher in eastern Japan; 1.8 C higher in western Japan and 1.3 higher in Okinawa Prefecture and Kagoshima Prefectureâ€™s Amami Islands. Eastern Japan, Okinawa and Amami recorded the highest average temperatures since such statistics started being recorded in 1946. Regarding average temperatures by location, record highs were marked in 62 sites (including central Tokyo) out of the 153 spots, which included the islands of Miyakejima, Hachijojima, Chichijima and Minami-Daitojima. According to the agency, high pressure covered western and eastern Japan, bringing high temperatures in many areas during rainy season in early July. Following the end of the rainy season, the high-pressure system made the heat even more intense. August is also expected to be hotter than average across the nation, with there likely being a series of extremely hot days with temperatures reaching 35 C or more, especially in the first half of the month. The agency has called for caution, saying the heatstroke risk will remain high.

author: Sports Columnist | by ANDY THAYER
title: Buxton to represent Twins at All-Star Game
text:
The Twinsâ€™ lone representative at Major League Baseballâ€™s All-Star Game July 15 will be center fielder Byron Buxton. This is an appropriate reflection of both Buxtonâ€™s strong â€¦

author: Ricardo RubÃ­
title: Claudia Sheinbaum celebra un aÃ±o de videos "Ciencia en un minuto" | El Heraldo de MÃ©xico
text: A travÃ©s de su cuenta de TikTok, Claudia Sheinbaum, precandidata de Morena, Partido del Trabajo (PT) y Partido Verde a la Presidencia de MÃ©xico, recordÃ³ el dÃ­a de ayer el primer aniversario de su cÃ¡psula informativa "Ciencia en un minuto", la cual sale en esa misma plataforma y aborda diversos temas como energÃ­a limpia, fenÃ³menos naturales, entre otros. Para celebrar, la ex mandataria capitalina (diciembre del 2018 a 2023) explicÃ³ la importancia de las plantas fotovoltaicas desde la Central de Abastos, sitio que ya cuenta con casi 21 hectÃ¡reas de paneles solares que son parte del proyecto de central fotovoltaica, impulsado por la propia precandidata Ãºnica de Morena. Claudia Sheinbaum seÃ±alÃ³ que el terreno cubierto representa 17.5 megawatts y genera alrededor de 26 millones de kilowatts-hora (kWh), lo que equivale a darle electricidad a cerca de 10 mil viviendas. Asimismo, recordÃ³ la que se construye de mayor tamaÃ±o en Sonora. Avance en la transiciÃ³n energÃ©tica en CDMX Desde el iniciÃ³ de su administraciÃ³n, Claudia Sheinbaum enfatizÃ³ sobre la importancia de apostar por la generaciÃ³n de energÃ­as limpias en la CDMX, a travÃ©s de programas o proyectos sustentables como la Planta de CarbonizaciÃ³n Hidrotermal en el Bordo Poniente de la Ciudad de MÃ©xico o la instalaciÃ³n de paneles solares. "Esta es una demostraciÃ³n de que creemos en las energÃ­as renovables y de que lo estamos desarrollando en conjunto desde el gobierno de la ciudad junto con SecretarÃ­a de EnergÃ­a y la ComisiÃ³n Federal de Electricidad", agregÃ³ la ex jefa de Gobierno durante una vista a dicha planta. Incluso, en el Programa Ambiental y de Cambio ClimÃ¡tico Ciudad de MÃ©xico 2019-2022 se encuentra el eje de Ciudad Solar, mismo que tiene el objetivo de convertir a la capital del paÃ­s en la Ciudad Solar mÃ¡s grande del mundo con proyectos enfocados en las energÃ­as renovables, entre los que se encuentran los anteriormente mencionados.

author: malvern-online.com
title: Houston, TX Author Publishes NCLEX Review Book | User | malvern-online.com
text:
(PRLeap.com) "NCLEX Strategy and Pharmacology Review Book", a new book by Julie Chinwe Anyanwu, RN, NPCH, MSN, has been released by Dorrance Publishing Co., Inc.
The purpose of this book is to offer strategies for answering questions concerning content, prioritization, pharmacology, and Next Generation exam questions to nurse students preparing for the NCLEX Exam and those taking the test again.
"NCLEX Strategy and Pharmacology Review Book" is a 198-page paperback with a retail price of $63.00 (eBook $58.00). The ISBN is 979-8-89211-149-2. Published by Dorrance Publishing Co., Inc. of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. For members of the press, to request a review copy or author interview, please visit https://bookstore.dorrancepublishing.com/pages/media-requests or to buy the book, visit our online bookstore at https://bookstore.dorrancepublishing.com/products/nclex-strategy-and-pharmacology-review-book GET IN TOUCH
Natasha Hlinka
Dorrance Publishing
http://www.dorrancepublishing.com

author: VNExplorer
title: Â¡Buenas noticias! Rescatan a caballo que sufrÃ­a de presunto maltrato y abandono
text:
El animal no contaba con agua, alimento, ni protecciÃ³n contra el sol o la lluvia.
La denuncia fue derivada a la FiscalÃ­a General del Estado (FGE), que rÃ¡pidamente solicitÃ³ la autorizaciÃ³n para llevar a cabo una orden de cateo, con el objetivo de rescatar al animal.
Las denuncias por maltrato animal en redes sociales y medios de comunicaciÃ³n abundan, visibilizando una problemÃ¡tica presente en varias esferas de la sociedad. Recientemente, un caso de presunto abandono comenzÃ³ a popularizarse en Tijuana, ciudad de MÃ©xico, por un caballo que se encontraba en pÃ©simas condiciones de cuidado.
Le recomendamos leer: Â¿CÃ³mo se debe regaÃ±ar a un gato correctamente para que obedezca?
Por ello, el personal de la DirecciÃ³n de Derecho y Bienestar Animal de la SecretarÃ­a de Medio Ambiente y Desarrollo Sustentable (SMADS) se dirigiÃ³ a un terreno irregular ubicado en la colonia Villa Fontana de Tijuana.
AllÃ­, varias denuncias ciudadanas reportaban la presencia de un caballo en condiciones inadecuadas, pues no contaba con un espacio suficiente para su especie, no tenÃ­a agua, alimento ni protecciÃ³n contra el sol y la lluvia. Estos hechos fueron verificados por el equipo que llegÃ³ al lugar.
La denuncia fue derivada a la FiscalÃ­a General del Estado (FGE), que rÃ¡pidamente solicitÃ³ la autorizaciÃ³n para llevar a cabo una orden de cateo, con el objetivo de rescatar al animal.
SegÃºn informÃ³ el medio local Infobaja, el operativo contÃ³ con la presencia de personal de la FGE, Agentes Estatales de InvestigaciÃ³n, la RegidurÃ­a de Bienestar Social, el Sistema Municipal de Parques TemÃ¡ticos de Tijuana (SIMPATT) y miembros del Departamento de Bienestar Animal de la SMADS.
En el transcurso del dÃ­a, se logrÃ³ el rescate del caballo y se procediÃ³ a trasladarlo a las instalaciones del Sistema Municipal de Parques TemÃ¡ticos de Tijuana para su resguardo temporal, bajo disposiciÃ³n de la FGE.
La titular de la SMADS, MÃ³nica Vega, expresÃ³ su agradecimiento al regidor Juan Carlos Hank Krauss, presidente de la ComisiÃ³n de Bienestar Social y miembro de la ComisiÃ³n de Medio Ambiente y Salud Municipal, quien brindÃ³ apoyo con un transporte adecuado tipo remolque para el traslado, garantizando el cumplimiento de las normas oficiales mexicanas.

author: Saima Andrabi
title: 7 Tips to Prevent Diseases During Monsoon in India
text:
Tips to Avoid Monsoon Diseases: The
monsoon season is a time of great relief from the scorching heat and rejuvenation for the environment in India. However, it also brings along a set of challenges, including an increased risk of monsoon-related diseases. The combination of excessive rainfall, humidity, and stagnant water creates a breeding ground for mosquitoes, bacteria, and viruses, leading to various illnesses.
The
 immune system gets weak during monsoons and therefore makes people susceptible to many diseases. People should therefore take a great care of their health during rainy season, and adopt measures to stay safe and protected. To stay healthy and enjoy the monsoon season to the fullest, it is crucial to take preventive measures. Following are some effective tips to protect yourself from monsoon-related diseases in India.
Common Diseases Caused During Monsoons in India
During the
monsoon, it is important to be aware of the common diseases that can be caused by the increased risk of infection. Some of the most common monsoon diseases in India include the following.
Cold and Flu
Viral fever
Dengue fever
Malaria
Typhoid
7 Tips to Stay Safe From Monsoon Diseases
By following below mentioned tips, you can help reduce your risk of contracting monsoon-related diseases and enjoy the season safely.
1. Maintain Personal Hygiene: Personal hygiene plays a pivotal role in preventing monsoon-related diseases. Some of the best practices to maintain a good hygiene include washing hands frequently with soap or use hand sanitizers, especially before eating anything, using toilet, and touching face or any other body part; taking regular showers to prevent bacterial and fungal infections; and keeping nails short and clean to avoid accumulation of dirt and germs.
2. Eat Safe and Clean Food: During the monsoon season, the risk of food contamination and waterborne diseases increases to a greater extent. To avoid the food related monsoon diseases, people must follow some important measures, including consuming freshly cooked food, drinking pure and boiled water, washing eatables before consuming, and using clean utensils and containers for food storage.
3. Stay Hydrated: Maintaining adequate hydration is essential during the monsoon season. While the temperature may be cooler, the humidity can lead to excessive sweating, which may result in dehydration. Drink clean and purified water at regular intervals to stay hydrated. You can also opt for herbal teas, lemon water, and fresh fruit juices to replenish essential nutrients.
4. Avoid Mosquitoes Bites: Mosquito-borne diseases such as
dengue, malaria, and chikungunya are prevalent during the monsoon season. Protect yourself from mosquito bites by using mosquito repellents or creams, wearing full sleeved clothes, keeping windows and doors closed, and using mosquito nets.
5. Maintain Clean Surroundings: Stagnant water becomes a breeding ground for mosquitoes and other disease-causing organisms. Take the some important steps to keep your surroundings clean. Some of these are disposing off garbage properly; removing stagnant water from flower pots, coolers, and other containers; and regularly cleaning and unclogging drains to prevent water accumulation.
6. Boost Your Immunity: A strong immune system is vital for preventing infections. To strengthen the immune system during the monsoon season, people must eat a balanced diet rich in fruits, vegetables, and whole grains; get enough sleep and rest to allow your body to recover and regenerate; engage in regular exercise or physical activity to boost immunity; and consider taking immunity-boosting supplements after consulting a healthcare professional.
7. Seek Immediate Medical Attention: If you experience any symptoms such as fever, body aches, diarrhea, or respiratory issues, seek medical attention promptly. Early diagnosis and treatment can prevent the escalation of diseases and aid in a speedy recovery.
(Disclaimer: Parts of this article were generated by AI and published after the content was editorially modified and verified by a human based on their own judgement and expertise. The Quint does not publish AI-generated content without direct human involvement and oversight).
(At The Quint, we are answerable only to our audience. Play an active role in shaping our journalism by
becoming a membe r. Because the truth is worth it.)

text:
Travis Kelceâ€™s ex Kayla Nicole overshadows Taylor Swift with daring video that flips the fame narrative Taylor Swiftâ€™s glamorous romance with NFL star Travis Kelce, his ex-girlfriend Kayla Nicoleis quietly â€” and powerfully â€” redefining what it means to own your narrative in the shadows of celebrity drama. In a sleek, head-turning behind-the-scenes video, Kayla showed up not with a breakup anthem or tabloid headline, but with a kind of raw presence that doesnâ€™t ask for attention â€” it demands it.
Kayla Nicole reclaims her spotlight with fearless energy that challenges the status quo
Sporting a curve-hugging ensemble and a confidence that couldnâ€™t be staged, Kayla reminded followers and critics alike that visibility doesn't require a stadium or a record deal. Her message wasnâ€™t loud, but it was unmistakable: power is personal, sensual, and sometimes too real for the mainstream spotlight.

Taylor Swift and Kayla Nicole offer two completely different versions of feminine power
The comparisons to Taylor Swift are inevitable â€” and fans werenâ€™t shy in pointing out the contrast. While Swift captivates through emotional ballads and sold-out arenas, Kaylaâ€™s appeal comes through strength, fitness, and bold physicality. She doesnâ€™t sing ballads â€” she moves like one. â€œSheâ€™s not trying to be Americaâ€™s sweetheart,â€ fans noted, â€œsheâ€™s building her own empire, one bold step at a time.â€
That difference is what makes Kaylaâ€™s recent resurgence so striking. She doesnâ€™t shy away from her sensuality. Her influence in the fitness space continues to grow, fueled by content thatâ€™s daring, unfiltered, and deeply rooted in personal empowerment. She doesnâ€™t just post for likes â€” sheâ€™s building a brand where confidence is currency.
Despite the ongoing media frenzy around Kelce and Swiftâ€™s high-profile relationship, Kayla Nicole has never really faded. Her rise may be quieter, but itâ€™s consistent. While others chase viral fame, Kayla is staking out long-term relevance by staying true to her identity.

Breakup buzz explodes as Travis Kelce seen partying solo in Vegas while Taylor Swift vanishes from spotlight
This isnâ€™t about competition. Itâ€™s about contrast. And in a world that often equates success with volume, Kayla Nicoleâ€™s calm, confident presence feels revolutionary. Because sometimes, the most unforgettable moves are made off the stage â€” and without saying a word.
